name: Robot shooting
description:
Shooting robot

In the year 2500.
Robots have taken over the world and wiped out the humanity until only the last group of human being survived. The last surviving humans have decided to build their robot by collecting parts from the wreckage of the destroyed robots that built to fight against all of evil robots. It's named B.O.S.S. and it is the last hope of humanity.

The Game Concept

- The gameplay is that we will play as " B.O.S.S. ",humans robot that was created to  fight the evil robots.
- In the game will make you feel the atmosphere after the world collapse
- Robot shooting is First person shooting game that comes with pixel theme.
- You will have to fight all of evil robots and destroy their boss.

How to play
- Use W-A-S-D to walk
- Use the mouse to turn around and aim
- Click left mouse to shoot enemy
- Use Q to punch the close enem
